Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Earn 10X DBS Points (or 20 miles) for every S$5 online spend & 3X DBS Points (or 6 miles) for every S$5 overseas spend. Enjoy flexible payments over 12 months at 0% interest and 0% processing fee.
Receive 2 complimentary visits to True Fitness Centres. Receive joining fee waiver (S$200) when you sign up for a 24-month True Fitness membership.
Enjoy Comfort & CityCab priority booking status.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: Earn 1 DBS point (2 miles) for every S$5 Online shopping. Additional 9X DBS Points (or 18 miles) for the first S$2,000 spend every calendar month.
To enjoy Comfort & CityCab priority booking status, enrol with 250 DBS Points and charge a minimum of 3 retail transactions every month.

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureDetails: Up to S$120 Cashback: 1. S$70 Cashback when you charge a min. of S$700 per month for the first 2 months AND 2. S$50 Cashback when you apply for DBS Cashline at the same time
Feature.FeatureRequire: Apply for the card before 31 March 2016.

Details.Name: Card Information
Details.Feature: Annual Fees Waiver - ConditionFirst Year Fee Waiver
Additional Card Annual FeeSupplementary card fee = SGD 93.60
Annual Fees Waiver - ConditionFirst Year Fee Waiver
Additional Card Annual FeeSupplementary card fee = SGD 93.60
